page.title: 17NOTTINGHAM - INDUSTRY
page.content: FACTORIES There is a big range of factories on Colwick Road in Sneinton,from engineering works to potato wholesalers.They are only small factories and most of them only have six to twelve people working there. Some people work as engineers and some store Corona pop and orange squash. Some just work as office workers and some work on old cars and lorries that need new engines or new doors.One factory provides things for schools and colleges and one sells potatoes but that opens at 5.30 in the morning so we didn't go there.The people who work in the factories are worried about their jobs and about the future in case they lose their jobs.
